item.title: Gergely Daroczi
item.description: Former assistant professor in statistics and data analysis, recovering social scientist – PhD in Sociology but more of a sysadmin/devops, a friend of AWS and a fan of automation, author and maintainer of a dozen of R packages and a book, passionate R developer and advocate, founder of the Hungarian R User Group and a reporting SaaS, organized the first satRday and the second eRum conferences, data engineer and a bit of scientist, open source enthusiast, husband, father of two.
